name: Organic Old Fashioned Rolled Oats
description: Heart-healthy whole grain oats, perfect for a warm breakfast or baking oatmeal cookies.

name: Whole Milk (1 Gallon)
description: Fresh, creamy whole milk rich in calcium and vitamin D. Great for cereals and coffee.

name: Fresh Bananas (Bunch)
description: Sweet and creamy tropical fruit. High in potassium and great for smoothies or on-the-go snacks.

name: Boneless Skinless Chicken Breast
description: Lean source of protein. Versatile for grilling, baking, or adding to salads and stir-frys.

name: Classic Marinara Sauce
description: Rich tomato sauce seasoned with garlic, basil, and oregano. Essential for pasta dishes.

name: Italian Spaghetti Pasta
description: Durum wheat semolina pasta. Pairs perfectly with marinara or meatballs for a classic meal.

name: Honeycrisp Apples
description: Crisp, juicy, and sweet red apples. A refreshing healthy snack.

name: Dark Chocolate Bar (70%)
description: Premium dark chocolate with rich cocoa flavor. A delicious treat with antioxidants.

name: Premium Roasted Coffee Beans
description: Aromatic roasted coffee beans. Grind fresh for the perfect morning brew.

name: Greek Yogurt (Plain)
description: Thick and creamy yogurt high in protein and probiotics. Great with granola or fruit.

name: Avocados (Bag of 4)
description: Ripe and creamy avocados. Perfect for guacamole or spreading on toast.

name: Almond Butter
description: Smooth and nutty spread made from roasted almonds. A great alternative to peanut butter.
